pageContext.claim: “You haven't gotten one [a pay raise] in more than 10 years -- more than 10 years. And we got you a big one. I got you a big one. I got you a big one.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump is flat wrong. According to the Department of Defense, active members of the military have received a pay increase every year since 1983. The pay raise for the military was the largest in 9 years, which appears to be where Trump gets the "10 years." On other occasions, Trump has gotten this factoid correct though he usually exaggerates by saying it is the largest increase "in more than 10 years."
